divs: Sighting Details I was on the top step about to enter into ourhouse when we saw a ligt blink like a shooting star in a zigzag motion a z withone more line to the left, then it vanished. I was in shock. I observe the starsevery night and what I saw was impossible to make sharp angles like that in amatter of seconds. We couldnt believe it. I just wanted to know if there wereany other sightings besides us.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around April 2nd 2002
Summary: Blinking light that made a z formation on 4/2/02 a
